room_data.name: Entrance
room_data.description: A creaky wooden door leads out of the dimly lit house. The air smells of dust and decay.

room_data.name: Hall
room_data.description: A long corridor stretches into darkness, paintings hanging from the walls.

items.name: Candle
items.description: A small wax candle. It might light up dark places.

room_data.name: Dining Room
room_data.description: An old wooden table is set with dusty plates, as if expecting unseen guests.

room_data.name: Basement
room_data.description: The cold, damp air surrounds you. Something moves in the shadows.

items.name: Rusty Key
items.description: An old key covered in rust. It might unlock something.

room_data.name: Attic
room_data.description: Cobwebs hang from the rafters, and an old chest sits in the corner.

room_data.name: Bedroom
room_data.description: A grand bed covered in dust dominates the room. A mirror reflects something that shouldn't be there.
